description: The Third Doctor was portrayed by Jon Pertwee. Sentenced to exile on Earth and forcibly regenerated at the end of The War Games, the Doctor spent his time working for UNIT (United Nations Intelligence Taskforce). After The Three Doctors, the Time Lords repealed his exile; however, the Doctor still worked closely with UNIT from time to time. The Third Doctor regenerated into his fourth incarnation as a result of radiation poisoning in the last moments of Planet of the Spiders.

episodes.description: The Doctor battles the Nestene Consciousness and its Autons.
The Doctor discovers an ancient race of reptiles living beneath the Earth's surface.
The Doctor uncovers a conspiracy involving alien ambassadors.
The Doctor encounters a parallel universe where a drilling project threatens Earth.
The Doctor and Jo Grant face the return of the Nestene Consciousness and the Autons, alongside the introduction of the The Master.
The Doctor and Jo Grant investigate a machine that can remove negative emotions, and encounter the The Master.
The Doctor and Jo Grant face the Axons, who offer Earth a new energy source with a hidden agenda.
The Doctor and Jo Grant travel to a human colony on a distant planet and encounter the The Master.
The Doctor and Jo Grant face the The Master, who is attempting to summon an ancient alien known as Azal.

episodes.title: Episode One

episodes.description: The Doctor and Jo Grant face a Dalek invasion from the future.
The Doctor and Jo Grant visit Peladon and become embroiled in royal intrigue.
The Doctor and Jo Grant encounter the Sea Devils, aquatic relatives of the Silurians.
The Doctor and Jo Grant investigate mutations on the planet Solos.
The Doctor and Jo Grant battle the The Master who has summoned Kronos, a powerful creature from Greek mythology.
The Doctor teams up with his past incarnations to face a threat from Omega.
The Doctor and Jo Grant find themselves in a miniaturized environment within a showman's peepshow.
The Doctor and Jo Grant find themselves caught in the middle of a war between humans and Draconians.
The Doctor and Jo Grant face the Daleks on the planet Spiridon.
The Doctor investigates a mining facility where the workers are turning green and dying.
The Doctor and Sarah Jane Smith face the Sontaran Linx in medieval times.
The Doctor and Sarah Jane Smith deal with dinosaurs appearing in London.
The Doctor and Sarah Jane Smith face the Daleks on the planet Exxilon.
The Doctor returns to Peladon and faces political intrigue and the Ice Warriors.
The Doctor faces giant spiders from Metebelis III, leading to his regeneration.
